CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Shop_Staff_Experience_ScoreR__c > 0, Shop_Staff_Experience_ScoreR__c <= 18), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01524000004lpcl", "Red",25, 25), IF(AND(Shop_Staff_Experience_ScoreR__c > 18, Shop_Staff_Experience_ScoreR__c <= 36), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01524000004lpcq", "Amber",25, 25), IF(Shop_Staff_Experience_ScoreR__c > 36, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01524000004lpcv", "Green",25, 25), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151o000005ZuOI", "No Status", 25, 25))))
CustomField.label: Shop Staff Experience Value
